title: U.S. Accuses North Korea of Sending Russia Munitions
description: A White House official says North Korea has covertly sent a “significant number” of artillery shells to Russia.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: A Ukrainian soldier looking into the hull of a damaged Russian armored vehicle in the Kharkiv region on Tuesday.
